titles.title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to establish a competitive grant program to enable States to purchase, customize, or repair vehicles with hot and cold food storage for delivering meals to older individuals through the Congregate Nutrition Program or the Home-Delivered Nutrition Program.
Helping Our Most Elderly Secure Meals Act
Helping Our Most Elderly Secure Meals Act
HOME Meals Act
HOME Meals Act
HOME Meals Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
